sentence: in March as the Wyoming incumbent looks to protect her seat against Trump-endorsed Republican primary challenger Harriet Hageman, according to an invitation obtained by The Hill.
title: Romney participating in fundraiser for Liz Cheney

sentence: Cheney has drawn several Republican challengers for Wyoming's at-large House seat, chief among them Harriet Hageman, a former Cheney supporter who won Trump's endorsement to take her on.
title: George W. Bush sends cash to GOP impeachment voters facing challengers

sentence: In Wyoming, Trump has publicly endorsed attorney Harriet Hageman's campaign to unseat Cheney.
author: Phil Shiver
title: George W. Bush donates to GOP lawmakers who voted to impeach Trump after Jan. 6 riot
